ch0093_00_staff_center_aprilfool_2021/32: Oh! You’re here! I’m so relieved.

I’m still carrying out my duties as the receptionist,
of course. So, without further ado...
Welcome! How can I help you today?
We hope to serve you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center_aprilfool_2021/33:
That’s it, Trista... Just act
like everything is normal,
no matter what happens!
